*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Mexico, September 5, 1833. Various reforms will be made in Texas. Instructions for locating land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[From Williams Papers, Rosenberg Library, Galveston, Tex.]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-05-1833">September 5. 1833*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir,*/p*
*p*I am in better spirits as to the result of our *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*matters, than I have been in since my arrival—a material change has been effected in the minds of several leading men on that subject and I now think that there will be no material opposition to the repeal of the 11 article of the *date_mentioned n="04-06-1833">6th april*/date_mentioned* law. The duties I think will be suspended in toto for one year at least and perhaps longer, or if this is not done, there will be an important modification. I shall also succeed fully in the alterations of the mails which I have proposed and the 11 article of the april law will be repealed.*/p*
*p*I have confidence in the result which I now anticipate, because this matter has been the subject of much and very mature deliberation, and the conclusions which I think the *person_mentioned*govt*/person_mentioned*, and *person_mentioned*leading men in congress*/person_mentioned* have come to, are therefore not hastily formed and may be relyed upon with the more confidence for that reason. Upon the whole I am of opinion that my trip to *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*in *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-183">1833*/date_mentioned*, will do as much, and perhaps more good for *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, than my trip in *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1822">1822*/date_mentioned* did—the latter laid a foundation to build upon, the former [will] raise the superstructure by removing the obstacles that have impeded its progress, and *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*will then become a *location_mentioned*State of this republic*/location_mentioned*, in harmony with the constitution and with the other states. But should the invaders succeed the aspect will be changed. Texas has not much to expect from the army or the church. I have unlimited confidence in the *person_mentioned*vice President Gomez Farias*/person_mentioned*, and I think that *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*will have cause to remember him with gratitude. Nothing is now wanting but a meeting of *person_mentioned*congress */person_mentioned*to dispatch all favorably. These matters were not sufficiently matured and understood, for *person_mentioned*congress */person_mentioned*to act safely on them untill within a week past, so that upon the whole, the cholera has done no harm in preventing the meeting of *person_mentioned*congress*/person_mentioned*. There is nothing like patience and perseverance.*/p*
*p*The representations from *location_mentioned*Gonzalez */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Trinity */location_mentioned*published at *location_mentioned*Monclova */location_mentioned*against the state, have had a good effect. I used them to show that the people were disposed to submit to *person_mentioned*Govt*/person_mentioned*, and did not wish to drive, or force measures, because they had confidence— that *person_mentioned*Govt*/person_mentioned*, would do what was right and just etc. I was told that this confidence was not misplaced etc. remember that *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1833">October */date_mentioned*is the limit for locating *location_mentioned*grants*/location_mentioned*—don't neglect that business. *person_mentioned*Don Victor*/person_mentioned* is very uneasy about his business—-don't neglect it—he is now a warm *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*—-don't forget *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Padill*/person_mentioned*[a's] [gra]nt*/location_mentioned*—also *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*H. Austin*/person_mentioned*s one league*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I suppose that I am tota[lly] forgotten in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*. I have only recd, one letter from there since I started—that was from *person_mentioned*John*/person_mentioned* dated *date_mentioned n="06-24-1833">24 June*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*There are still some cases of cholera tho. not many—my health is good—write to *person_mentioned*Perry */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Phillips */person_mentioned*the contents of this and remember me to all persons, for I wish well to everybody in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. A*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*I refer you to my letter to the *person_mentioned*Ayuntamiento*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
